name: Electro Image LLC
tag_list: printing, graphics, graphic-design, postcards, fundraiser-cards, fundraising, consultants
overview:
As a professional printer we match your project to the ideal press size for the highest efficiency. We make every marketing dollar count whether you are local in St. Louis, Missouri, in our Kansas City printing market or anywhere in the United States including our local print and graphic design offering as the best Chicago printer and our latest region in Texas (including the cities of Dallas and Forth Worth).

Graphic Design Our in-house, full-service graphic design team moves your custom printing project along quickly, economically and with customer service second-to-none.

Lowest Cost Printing Electro Image always delivers on our promise to produce printing at the lowest possible cost for your one-color to full-color print project. We handle business cards to large banners, and everything in-between. Give us your concept for your business, association, event or charity. We will design and print it!

Custom Projects For even more services please give us a call to discuss all of your marketing needs. We can provide highly targeted databases, original copywriting for your communications to existing or new targets, Trade PR, direct mail (with postcard mailers as well as newsletter design), and web marketing.
